name: Clarium Group
overview:
Clarium is a boutique technology services firm with fundamental roots in providing traditional legacy IT support services and specializing in Cloud technology.

With over 20 years of cumulative industry experience and multinational exposure, Clarium has the expertise to proactively assist clients at all levels of IT development, operations, service, virtualization and maintenance. We provide a virtual IT environment for companies moving towards Cloud technology and a more cost-effective approach towards total IT needs and client demands.

The Clarium Cloud is a premier and completely private service configuration. Unlike standard cloud offerings, our service encompasses the full spectrum of IT from start to finish. As opposed to only delivering managed components, leaving the bulk of management responsibilities on you, Clarium empowers internal IT departments to focus on more pressing strategic issues to drive the core business. Clarium offers a full range of IT services and focuses on a comprehensive managed approach to IT, from end-to-end.
